content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":26178,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e80e6e86-8228-45d0-9ac7-17f164cbc1d5/QE_onboarding_21.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e80e6e86-8228-45d0-9ac7-17f164cbc1d5/QE_onboarding_21.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_21.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_21.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e80e6e86-8228-45d0-9ac7-17f164cbc1d5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":461,\"height\":135},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Testing as a service (TaaS) is a crowd testing service model. Crowd testing is software testing by community (Crowd). EPAM's internal Crowd testing is staffed by people on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1475464911\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"bench\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (with no project assignments/workload), as well as by those who are interested in the initiative \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCTSTIO/Extra-mile+Projects\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"as an extra-mile\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thanks to TaaS model, the company can offer services to clients without hiring new employees. While engineers can apply their skills by helping other projects and QA teams to cope with the workload. Working in internal crowd, they gain experience in a new domain in a short period of time. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"TaaS now offers assignments for both manual testers and test automation engineers. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to get into the initiative? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can join TaaS and EPAM Crowd at any time! However, while on bench, participating in Crowd Tests are a priority. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you are a manual tester, you need to be trained and register on the Test IO platform using your EPAM account. You need to specify the devices available for testing and set your profile to \\\"Available for Test\\\". After that you will receive invitations to tests that fit all your parameters (country, language, device for testing etc.). The number of invitations depends primarily on the needs of customers and can vary, there may be days without invitations to tests, and sometimes there will be several to choose from.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can always refresh your knowledge in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCTSTIO/test+IO+Handbook+for+Testers\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"tester's handbook\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Test automation engineers are involved in crowdsourcing tests through the Cirro platform, where tasks are allocated based on technology and skills. So, when registering, fill in your profile carefully. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" about Crowd testing in QE from our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCTSTIO/Contribute+as+a+Tester\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". And our colleagues share their experience in test IO in a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/topics/global/competencies-technologies/articles/2021/oct/taas-blitz-interview-what-do-testers-think-about_en.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"blitz survey\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For questions about Crowd testing, you can contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Yuliya_Hryshchankova?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yuliya Hryshchankova\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Viktoryia_Valakh?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Viktoryia Valakh\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
